case.title: Mistress please - 39 (London Berkshire)
case.text: Are there any women who are looking for a casual relationship with a sporty athletic guy who likes the finer things in life? I like travelling and dining out. I am in a difficult relationship and looking for a woman who can spend some time with me and enjoy life. If you are interested i would love to hear your details. Please also send your pictures and number.Thanks
